name: @piedata/pieui
description: A React component library featuring PieCard component

scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && rm -rf pieui-*.tgz && bun run build:clean && NODE_ENV=production bun run build:esm && NODE_ENV=production bun run build:cjs && NODE_ENV=production bun run build:components:esm && NODE_ENV=production bun run build:components:cjs && NODE_ENV=production bun run build:types && NODE_ENV=production bun run build:cli && bun src/cli.ts postbuild --src-dir src --out-dir dist && bun pm pack
scripts.build:esm: bun build src/index.ts --outfile dist/index.esm.js --format esm --target browser --jsx=automatic --jsx-import-source=react --external react --external react-dom --external highlight.js --external rehype-highlight --external glob --external typescript --external typescript-json-schema --external @tanstack/react-query --minify
scripts.build:cjs: bun build src/index.ts --outfile dist/index.js --format cjs --target node --jsx=automatic --jsx-import-source=react --external react --external react-dom --external highlight.js --external rehype-highlight --external glob --external typescript --external @tanstack/react-query --external typescript-json-schema --minify
scripts.build:components:esm: bun build src/components/index.ts --outfile dist/components/index.esm.js --format esm --target browser --jsx=automatic --jsx-import-source=react --external react --external react-dom --external highlight.js --external rehype-highlight --external glob --external @tanstack/react-query --external typescript --external typescript-json-schema --minify
scripts.build:components:cjs: bun build src/components/index.ts --outfile dist/components/index.js --format cjs --target node --jsx=automatic --jsx-import-source=react --external react --external react-dom --external highlight.js --external rehype-highlight --external glob --external typescript --external @tanstack/react-query --external typescript-json-schema --minify
scripts.build:esm:debug: bun build src/index.ts --outfile dist/index.esm.js --format esm --target browser --jsx=automatic --jsx-import-source=react --external react --external react-dom --external highlight.js --external rehype-highlight --external glob --external typescript --external typescript-json-schema --external @tanstack/react-query
scripts.build:cjs:debug: bun build src/index.ts --outfile dist/index.js --format cjs --target node --jsx=automatic --jsx-import-source=react --external react --external react-dom --external highlight.js --external rehype-highlight --external glob --external typescript --external @tanstack/react-query --external typescript-json-schema
scripts.build:components:esm:debug: bun build src/components/index.ts --outfile dist/components/index.esm.js --format esm --target browser --jsx=automatic --jsx-import-source=react --external react --external react-dom --external highlight.js --external rehype-highlight --external glob --external @tanstack/react-query --external typescript --external typescript-json-schema
scripts.build:components:cjs:debug: bun build src/components/index.ts --outfile dist/components/index.js --format cjs --target node --jsx=automatic --jsx-import-source=react --external react --external react-dom --external highlight.js --external rehype-highlight --external glob --external typescript --external @tanstack/react-query --external typescript-json-schema
scripts.build:debug: rm -rf ./dist && rm -rf pieui-*.tgz && bun run build:clean && NODE_ENV=production bun run build:esm:debug && NODE_ENV=production bun run build:cjs:debug && NODE_ENV=production bun run build:components:esm:debug && NODE_ENV=production bun run build:components:cjs:debug && NODE_ENV=production bun run build:types && NODE_ENV=production bun run build:cli && bun src/cli.ts postbuild --src-dir src --out-dir dist && bun pm pack
scripts.build:cli: bun build src/cli.ts --outfile dist/cli.js --format cjs --target node --external vm2
scripts.release: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:prerelease: npm version prerelease --preid=beta && git push && git push --tags
scripts.unrelease: git tag -d v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push origin :refs/tags/v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
